ValidationRule.description: When you set Billing Rate or Cost Rate to Standard, you must enter a value in the Billing Day Rate or Cost Day Rate field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(AND(ISPICKVAL( amc__Project_Day_Rate__c , "Standard"), ISBLANK( amc__Day_Rate__c )), AND(ISPICKVAL( amc__Cost_Rate__c , "Standard"), ISBLANK( amc__Cost_Day_Rate__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Billing Rate = Standard you must specify a value in Billable Day Rate. If Cost Rate = Standard, you must specify a value in Cost Day Rate
